About LSA-space (RDF + ACID)

This project provides an alternative implementation of LSA-space which provides native support to ACID transactions. jena-tdb (component on which this implementation is based) is meant to be an high-performance solution and that's why it's memory fingerprint is big (documentation declares a Java Heap Space requirement of 1GB). This solution could be problematic on pervasive systems.
